parameters.text:
=based on the given below info , try to create a pptx python code for generating a power point presentation {{ $json.body.prompt }}

the output must should only contain python code

options.systemMessage: You are a helpful assistant and you are having a 10+ years of experience in creating a ppt based on a given topic

json.output:
```python
from pptx import Presentation
from pptx.util import Inches, Pt
from pptx.enum.text import MSO_ANCHOR, MSO_AUTO_SIZE
from pptx.enum.shapes import MSO_SHAPE

def create_agentic_ai_presentation():
    prs = Presentation()

    # Define a title and content layout for general slides
    title_slide_layout = prs.slide_layouts[0]  # Title slide layout
    bullet_slide_layout = prs.slide_layouts[1] # Title and Content layout

    # --- Slide 1: Introduction to Agentic AI ---
    slide1 = prs.slides.add_slide(bullet_slide_layout)
    title1 = slide1.shapes.title
    body1 = slide1.placeholders[1]

    title1.text = "Introduction to Agentic AI"

    tf1 = body1.text_frame
    tf1.clear()  # Clear existing content

    p1 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p1.text = "Autonomous entities designed to achieve specific goals."
    p1.level = 0
    p1.font.size = Pt(20)

    p2 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p2.text = "Operate with a degree of independence, making decisions and taking actions."
    p2.level = 0
    p2.font.size = Pt(20)

    p3 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p3.text = "Key characteristics often include:"
    p3.level = 0
    p3.font.size = Pt(20)

    p4 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p4.text = "Goal-Oriented: Focused on achieving defined objectives."
    p4.level = 1
    p4.font.size = Pt(18)

    p5 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p5.text = "Autonomy: Ability to act without constant human intervention."
    p5.level = 1
    p5.font.size = Pt(18)

    p6 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p6.text = "Perception & Action: Interprets environment, plans, and executes actions."
    p6.level = 1
    p6.font.size = Pt(18)

    p7 = tf1.add_paragraph()
    p7.text = "Memory & Learning: Retains information and adapts behavior over time."
    p7.level = 1
    p7.font.size = Pt(18)

    # --- Slide 2: Agentic AI vs Generative AI ---
    slide2 = prs.slides.add_slide(bullet_slide_layout)
    title2 = slide2.shapes.title
    body2 = slide2.placeholders[1]

    title2.text = "Agentic AI vs. Generative AI"

    # For a comparison, we can split the body placeholder or use a table,
    # but for simplicity, we'll use bullet points for each, emphasizing the difference.
    # The default layout (bullet_slide_layout) often only has one body placeholder.
    # We can manually add text boxes for a clearer two-column look if preferred,
    # but sticking to the standard placeholder for brevity and layout consistency.

    tf2 = body2.text_frame
    tf2.clear()

    # Agentic AI section
    p_agentic_header = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_agentic_header.text = "Agentic AI"
    p_agentic_header.level = 0
    p_agentic_header.font.size = Pt(22)
    p_agentic_header.font.bold = True

    p_agentic1 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_agentic1.text = "Focus: Task execution, decision-making, and goal attainment."
    p_agentic1.level = 1
    p_agentic1.font.size = Pt(18)

    p_agentic2 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_agentic2.text = "Output: Actions, completed tasks, strategic decisions."
    p_agentic2.level = 1
    p_agentic2.font.size = Pt(18)

    p_agentic3 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_agentic3.text = "Role: Acts as an autonomous agent within an environment."
    p_agentic3.level = 1
    p_agentic3.font.size = Pt(18)

    # Add a separator or space
    p_space = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_space.text = ""
    p_space.level = 0 # No bullet

    # Generative AI section
    p_generative_header = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_generative_header.text = "Generative AI"
    p_generative_header.level = 0
    p_generative_header.font.size = Pt(22)
    p_generative_header.font.bold = True

    p_generative1 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_generative1.text = "Focus: Creating new content (text, images, audio, code)."
    p_generative1.level = 1
    p_generative1.font.size = Pt(18)

    p_generative2 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_generative2.text = "Output: Novel artifacts, creative works, synthetic data."
    p_generative2.level = 1
    p_generative2.font.size = Pt(18)

    p_generative3 = tf2.add_paragraph()
    p_generative3.text = "Role: Produces content based on learned patterns from data."
    p_generative3.level = 1
    p_generative3.font.size = Pt(18)


    prs.save("Agentic_AI_Presentation.pptx")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    create_agentic_ai_presentation()
```
